wiki.content: Selena told Billboard: "It was actually the first song I recorded and it was really fun and I feel like everyone can relate to that song. It's kind of one of those songs about living in the moment while keeping it a big huge summer dance track. That one was really fun and kind of dance poppy." (Source Hit The Lights Songfacts). User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Selena told Billboard: "It was actually the first song I recorded and it was really fun and I feel like everyone can relate to that song. It's kind of one of those songs about living in the moment while keeping it a big huge summer dance track. That one was really fun and kind of dance poppy." (Source Hit The Lights Songfacts).
